jump_scares.spoiler: Lisa and Kate drop the camera and a shark suddenly appears from below and eats it
There is a loud bang and the cage drops slightly
The shark passes just above Kate
The shark bangs into the cage as Kate tries to open the hatch
The shark bites one of the bars on the cage
The shark suddenly attacks Lisa as she approaches the opening of the cavern she is hiding in
The shark suddenly swims into Lisa
Lisa bumps into Javier who tells her to get back to the cage, he is then attacked by the shark
Lisa turns around and Javier’s dead body appears right in front of her
After Kate says “open the hatch” the shark attacks her
Lisa lights a flare to reveal several sharks are circling them
